unnormalised: I had a really bad experience with Speedy Delivery last week. They were supposed to deliver a package to my home, 12, Park Street, Kolkata, 700016, on 28/07/2024. But the guy kept calling saying he couldn't find the address. I gave him directions multiple times, told him it's near the Birla Mandir, but still nothing. Finally, he left it at my neighbor's place at 15A Park Street instead, without even asking me first! Luckily, my neighbor is a good person, or else who knows what would have happened to my new saree. I think Speedy Delivery needs to train their delivery guys better.
normalised: I had a really bad experience with Speedy Delivery last week. They were supposed to deliver a package to my home, twelve, Park Street, Kolkata, seven hundred thousand and sixteen, on twenty eighth july two thousand and twenty four. But the guy kept calling saying he couldn't find the address. I gave him directions multiple times, told him it's near the Birla Mandir, but still nothing. Finally, he left it at my neighbor's place at fifteen A Park Street instead, without even asking me first! Luckily, my neighbor is a good person, or else who knows what would have happened to my new saree. I think Speedy Delivery needs to train their delivery guys better.
